lines:
956

Y

Luk.

222 N. Wayne 87 
Angola, Ind.

Nov. 15, 1911. 
My dear Mr. Stearns,

Gour letter of last 
Moncho has been received some 
time ago. I thank you ever 
so much for your compliment. 
Am so happy to learn that 
Mch english is improving. Really 
I do not notice it. But ampray 
I try my best to write and to 
peak correctly.

I never dreams that 
everything is going to change on
raw: 956 Y Luk. 222 N. Wayne 87 Angola, Ind. Nov. 15, 1911. My dear Mr. Stearns, Gour letter of last Moncho has been received some time ago. I thank you ever so much for your compliment. Am so happy to learn that Mch english is improving. Really I do not notice it. But ampray I try my best to write and to peak correctly. I never dreams that everything is going to change on

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter thanking Stearns for his compliment on Luk's English. Luk comments on the improvements at Phillips Academy. He comments on the war between Italy and Turkey. He regrets that he has not heard from home and does not know what is happening in Tientsin.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
